conversations.content: Delete the existing ssh key from my github account.
You should verify your account first. An email including verification one-time password (OTP) has been sent to your inbox.

<|Function_Thought|>
The function call to retrieve SSH keys requires account verification first. The user has received an email with a one-time password (OTP) for verification. The next step is to advise the user to check their email and provide the OTP for verification.
<|/Function_Thought|>

<|Final_Answer|>
Please check your email inbox for a message containing the one-time password (OTP) for verification. Once you have it, kindly provide it here to proceed with the deletion of the SSH key.
<|/Final_Answer|>
